name: Potato legacy
description:
Here is a brief description of the game.

In the land of vegetables, A good potato restores the glories of his ancestors and acquires their power and skills by defeating evil.

 

1 - Enemies :

 

Tomato: A worthy opponent who can be killed using fire.

  

Carrot: Another worthy opponent who can't be killed, you can only evade it.

2 - Collectibles :

Water: You should collect water to be able to use the special abilities that your ancestors will teach you at the end of each level.

3- if you pass the yellow flag you will respawn from this checkpoint. 

4- every time you meat your fathers you gain a new feature ;

 first : you gain the shooting (use this feature to kill the tomato) 

Second : you gain the hide. Use it to hide from carrot and fire and every think ( a tip from developer if you feel you will dead hold it fastly) 

Third :  the shield. Use it to protect yourself from every thing, it's a powerful feature

All this feature subtract from your water use it wisely. 

 

-Move from arows

- jump from space

- right shot from X (if you opened it) 

- left shot from Z (if you opened it) 

- shield from C (if you opened it)

- hide from V hold (if you opened it)

- press space to close the fathers panel

Have fuuunnnnnnn

You will not be able to win the gaaaameee😈😈
